|brand = BenQ |model = GH680F |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = camera, digital (still) camera |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AAD3AA0D0,COFWMNBM11 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = iCatch;SPCA5330A; |cpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34ML01G100TFI00; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = <!-- Size of RAM --> |ram1chip = Samsung;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->

|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_conn = <!-- Connector Type --> |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Ability Enterprise |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/11/2013 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = USI WM-N-BM-14 |rad1modif = SDIO (module) |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43362; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The initial filing includes only the '''USI''' wireless module data. :A C2PC made 09/11/2013 includes the data for the whole device.
Per the FCC photos... The device is using... *An [http://www.icatchtek.com/files/SPCA5330A_PF_V2.pdf '''iCatch''' SPCA5330A-HB251] ''Digital Still Camera Controller'' *A [http://www.richtek.com/download_ds.jsp?s=823 '''Richtek''' ''RT5002C] Power Management Unit (PMU) :w/ Li-Ion battery charger for digital still cameras'' *An '''USI''' WM-N-BM-02_D Wi-Fi module :*Per the initial filing, this module uses BCM43362
Additional specifications, per the FCC (draft) manual, follow... *Sensor: '''Sony''' 20 MP, 1/2.3 inch CCD *Zoom **Optical: 35x **Digital: Up to 8X (preview) / Up to 10X (Playback) **Wise: Up to 3x *Lens **f = 4.62 (W) ~ 152.48 (T) mm **F= 3.0 (W) ~ 5.9 (T) **(f = 25 ~ 875 mm, 35 mm equivalent) *Dimensions: [[Dimensions::132.2 mm x 98.2 mm x 91.1 mm]] [perhaps wrong] *Weight: [[Weight::510 g]] (w/o battery and SD Card) [probably wrong, ''TBC''] *etc, etc
The USB charger (Female A port) shown included with the device in the FCC photos is either a :'''Technics-GP''' TS05M-2U050-0501US (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, max. 0.2A -> 5.0VDC, 1.0A) :or an ''unbranded'' TR-06AM-V (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.2A -> 5.0VDC, 700mA). The battery is shown as a '''Fuji Electronics (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd.''' Model: NP-120 (1ICP10/34/50) / :P/N: VG0376122700011 (Li-Ion, 3.7V, 1700mAh, 6.29Wh).
[[Category:English Documentation]]
